plot: A virginal boy travels with three hookers to a small island to collect his estranged father's washed up and sun-bleached bones.
title: Buta no mukui
plot_es: A virginal boy travels with three hookers to a small island to collect his estranged father's washed up and sun-bleached bones.
plot_en: A virginal boy travels with three hookers to a small island to collect his estranged father's washed up and sun-bleached bones.
